general_advisory: Ensure proper pest management and take care of animal health during winter.

advisory: White grub infestation can be minimized by drenching Chloropyriphos or Imidacloprid at the plant base.
To manage mites in chilli crop, spray Ethion 50% EC, Spiromesifen 22.9% SC, or Propargite 57 % EC.
To control aphid in tomato, spray neem oil formulation or Flonicam as recommended.
Use yellow sticky traps to attract and kill White fly in Brinjal.
During primary stage of pest infestation spray neem-based pesticide or chemical sprays like Thiamethoxam, Pyriproxifen, or Spiromesifen.
Transplant onion seedlings properly with required nutrients in the main field as specified.
To control leaf blight, stem rot, and root knot nematode in tuberose, spray recommended fungicides and nematicides as specified.
Insulate poultry houses during winter and ensure proper ventilation.
Provide mineral and calcium supplements to laying birds.
